Title: Manjadikuru
Writer: Anjali Menon, Paliyath Aparna Menon (dialogue writer), Kavalam Narayana Panicker (lyrics)
Actors: Prithviraj Sukumaran, Thilakan, Jagathi Sreekumar, Rahman
Plot: This is story of homecoming from the late 1970s. Ten-year-old Vicky arrives at his grandparents' home in rural Kerala to attend his grandfather's funeral. The disjointed family gathers ...
